char_4124_iana.name: 双子分身复制器
char_4124_iana.desc: When deployed, Iana places a hologram on the deployment tile. The hologram does not attack; When the hologram is attacked, remove <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> to the attacker, then immediately swap to [Substitute]
